page.title: 17EWELL VILLAGE contd.
page.content: Just off the High Street is{Bourne {Hall.}This complex contains a library,museum,hall and Health Centre. The building was opened in 1970. The {Ewell Springs,}which encouraged people to settle at Ewell in earlier times can be seen nearby. Just outside Ewell is {Nonsuch Park.} This large park lies between the A24 London Road and the A232 Cheam Road. The park contains the ruins of Nonsuch Palace which was built for Henry VIII. In the centre of the park is the Mansion House which was built in 1802.
